author: parithosh
content:
You'd have to follow the instructions and post here: https://github.com/eth-clients/sepolia/issues/12

But the existing validator set has decided that its a bad idea to make the validator set in sepolia bigger unless there are really good reasons to do so as each new entity makes it harder to co-ordinate upgrades. If there's a strong reason to host validators, we can help you host more validators on Goerli or show you how to setup your own private testnets. Additionally there's an upcoming ephermeral testnet idea that a lot of community members are working on, perhaps that could also be a good fit.
